entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 4.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince Rupert Airport 2:00 PM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 4.9°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 81 %
Dewpoint: 1.9°C
Wind: ESE 18 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers. Wind light except northeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 near mainland valleys and inlets early this afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few rain showers or wet flurries. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain showers and wet flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries early in the morning. Rain beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning except gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections late in the afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023
